Articles.Content:
I would love to have the reflective stainless steel look of the SpaceX starship in the game.

Implementing that would be quite easy, as the "textures unlimited" package shows, simply set all surfaces except windows to full reflection. It looks cool and would add a completely new look to parts without any additional design work.

Here is a look at a plane of mine in stainless steel:

Edited October 9, 2019 by dr.phees
Added picture.
IIRC, they did say that bare metal versions of all parts will exist.
Can confirm. They also said all the assets in the trailer are in-game, just rendered with a fancier pipeline. That includes a whole bunch of bare metal.
